snippet: Mr. Smith, a Democrat from Queens, was accused of conspiring to pay bribes to Republican leaders in an effort to run for New York City mayor in 2013.
abstract: Malcolm A Smith, former New York State Senate majority leader, is convicted of federal corruption charges including bribery, wire fraud and extortion; Smith, a Democrat, is accused of bribing Republican legislators in attempt to run for New York City mayor on Republican ballot in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Smith, a Democrat from Queens, was accused of conspiring to pay bribes to Republican leaders in an effort to run for New York City mayor in 2013.

headline.main: Malcolm Smith, Ex-New York Senate Chief, Is Convicted of Corruption
headline.print_headline: Ex-State Senate Chief Guilty of Bribery
